title: Test cases for CSAF
description: Representation of the data provided for test cases from section 6 of the specification.

file_t.title: File information
file_t.description: Contains information about a single test file.

name.title: Name of the test file
name.description: Contains the filename and path relative to the JSON that includes this object.

valid.title: Evaluation result
valid.description: States whether the test file is valid according to the CSAF standard.

test_t.title: Test
test_t.description: Contains test data for a single test.

failures.title: List of failing examples
failures.description: Contains a list of files of examples that fail that specific test.

group.title: Test group
group.description: Contains the name of the group the test belongs to.

id.title: Number of the test
id.description: Contains the section number of the test in the specification.

valid.title: List of valid examples
valid.description: Contains a list of files of examples that pass that specific test.

tests.title: List of tests
tests.description: Contains a list of test data.

testschema_version.title: Test schema version
testschema_version.description: Contains the current version of this schema
